definition: to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: The nonuniform correction technique is an important technique of the microbolometer.
sentences.chinese: 非均勻性校正是紅外熱輻射成像的一個重要技術。

sentences.english: Non-thermal radiation spectra are also observed.
sentences.chinese: 對非熱輻射譜也進行了觀測。

sentences.english: It is theoretic foundation for when to use 1-D theory of the photothermal radiometry.
sentences.chinese: 這就爲何時使用一維光熱輻射測量理論提供依據。

sentences.english: The Uncooled Infrared FPA is the key component of the microbolometer.
sentences.chinese: 非製冷紅外焦平面器件是微測熱輻射計的核心部件。

sentences.english: The same result was observed in rat heat radiation tail-flick assay.
sentences.chinese: 在大鼠熱輻射甩尾模型上也得到了類似的結果。

sentences.english: ASTM E 648:Standard test method for critical radiant flux of floor-covering systems using a radiant heat energy source.
sentences.chinese: 使用輻射熱源法對地板覆蓋物進行臨界熱輻射測試。

sentences.english: The thermal radiation of shorter wavelengths than the visible are called ultraviolet .
sentences.chinese: 波長短於可見光的熱輻射稱紫外線。

sentences.english: Most of the heat transfer in the air spaces are converted into the heat transfer of heat radiation.
sentences.chinese: 間層中的傳熱大部分轉化爲熱輻射傳熱。

sentences.english: ASTM E 648: Stard test method for critical radiant flux of floor-covering systems using a radiant heat energy source.
sentences.chinese: 使用輻射熱源法對地板覆蓋物進行臨界熱輻射測試。

sentences.english: The thermic rays emitted by the explosion burned the pattern of this woman's kimono upon her back.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸釋放的熱輻射將她所着和服背後的花紋燒燬。

sentences.english: Standard test method for critical radiant flux of floor-covering systems using a radiant heat energy source.
sentences.chinese: 使用輻射熱源法對地板覆蓋物進行臨界熱輻射測試。

sentences.english: The darker areas within Saturn show the strongest thermal radiation.
sentences.chinese: 土星上比較黑暗的區域顯示出最強烈的熱輻射。

sentences.english: The relative heat radiation rate of pyrophyllite is fairly low.
sentences.chinese: 葉蠟石相對熱輻射率較低。
